text: hageye, yara prakaranavannu mundudalagitto a muvaru. Bhumiyu tannella vaisalyada horatagiyu avara palige tira sankucitavagi bittittu mattu avarige svatah tam'ma jivagala kuritu jigupse untagittu. Allahanedege oliyuvudannu bittare, (tamage) avana kadeyinda beravude asraya illa embudannu avaru managandiddaru. Konege, avaru pascattapa padalendu avanu avaredege olavu toridanu. Khanditavagiyu allahanu pascattapa svikarisuvavanu mattu karunaluvagiddane
